title: Friends not appearing
body: every time I log in the friends section is entirely black. I can't invite and I can't accept invitations from the friends list. Logging out and back in doesn't fix it. Anyone else having the same issue?

replies.body: Seems this is a widespread issue.  Funny enough, I played like 5 hours ago and didn't have the issue, and now it won't go away.
I played about 5 hours ago too and everything was just fine. Now it's all buggy.
